name: Plane Shooter Beta
description:
Hey everyone! I was working on the Plane Shooter Game, my first mobile game. Here’s the first beta launch of the game. You can play this beta version (0.1) of the game on your windows pc.

Be free to give your opinions, suggestions and feedback in the comments. I will try to reply on each one of them.

You can use W, A, S, D keys or the arrow keys to move the plane. You can dm me on instagram (@playgamerying) or comment here if you face any problem regarding anything.

Stay tuned for the upcoming beta releases!
